thing-type.label: DAS-102 Double relay Switch 2x1.7kW
thing-type.description: Double relay Switch 2x1.7kW<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gthttps://defaro.ru/index.php/support/instructions/70-das-102</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPut controller in inclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtPower on device. It should be added automatically (using NWI).</li&gt <li&gtIf not fast press add/remove button three times.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPut controller in exclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtFast press add/remove button three times.</li&gt <li&gtPlease note that all parameters except for parameters 15 & 16 will reset to their default state</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtAlways woken.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Switch behavior
parameter.description: Selects ON/OFF/BLINK modes

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Relay closed interval
parameter.description: For blink mode for both S1 and S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets relays ON state time in 1/10 of second, if Parameter 1 or 10 set to 3</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Relay open interval
parameter.description: For blink mode for both S1 and S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets relays OFF state time in 1/10 of second, if Parameter 1 or 10 set to 3</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: S1 auto off delay
parameter.description: Sets auto off delay for S1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets delay after which switch S1 will turn off in 1/10 sec. (0 - disable)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: S1 On delay
parameter.description: Delay after ON command received<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets time after which switch S1 will turn on after receiving ON command in 1/10 sec. (0 - disable feature)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: S1 smart delay
parameter.description: Smart off delay for S1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets time after which switch S1 will turn off after receiving OFF command in 1/10 sec.</p&gt <p&gtEvents to which this delay is applicable set in Parameter 18.</p&gt <p&gt(0 - disable feature)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: S1 powerfail recovery
parameter.description: Powerfail recovery mode for S1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtRecovery behavior for S1</p&gt <p&gt0 - restore (default)</p&gt <p&gt1 - set to OFF state</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: All ON/OFF behaviour
parameter.description: All ON/OFF behaviour<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - React on All ON/All OFF</p&gt <p&gt1 - Ignore All ON/All OFF</p&gt <p&gt2 - Ignore All ON/React on All OFF</p&gt <p&gt3 - React on All ON/Ignore All OFF</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Relay S2 mode
parameter.description: Relay S2 mode of operation<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets S2 mode of operation:<br /&gt<br /&gt0 - normal mode (ON-turn switch on, 1 - turn switch off) (default)<br /&gt<br /&gt1 - reverse mode (ON-turn switch off, 1 - turn switch on)<br /&gt<br /&gt2 - Blink mode (see parameters 2 and 3)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: S2 auto off time
parameter.description: Sets auto off time for S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets time after which switch S2 will turn off in 1/10 sec. (0 - disable)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_2
parameter.label: 12: S2 turn on delay
parameter.description: Sets turn on delay for S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets delay after which switch S1 will turn on after receiving ON command in 1/10 sec. (0 - disable)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_2
parameter.label: 13: S2 smart delay
parameter.description: Smart delay for S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets smart delay for S2 in 1/10sec (see Parameters 2,3,6 for description) (0-disable)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: S2 powerfail recovery
parameter.description: Powerfail recovery mode for S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtRecovery behavior for S2</p&gt <p&gt0 - restore (default)</p&gt <p&gt1 - set to OFF state</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: S1 button mode
parameter.description: S1 button operation mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtType of button connected to S1 switch</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: S2 button mode
parameter.description: S2 button operation mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtType of button connected to S2 switch</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Smart delay
parameter.description: Smart delay mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - implicit smart delay</p&gt <p&gt1 - use smart delay for all devices NOT in Group 1. Also smart delay ignored for controller and button issued commands</p&gt <p&gt2 - use smart delay for all devices IN Group 1. Also smart delay will be used for controller and button issued commands</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_50_1
parameter.label: 50: Forced secure mode
parameter.description: Forced secure mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - accept non-secure commands</p&gt <p&gt1 - accept only secure commands</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_51_1
parameter.label: 51: Secure send for S1
parameter.description: Send secure commands for S1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - Send non-secure commands to Group 2 (S1 associations)</p&gt <p&gt1 - Send secure commands to Group 2 (S1 associations)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_52_1
parameter.label: 52: Secure send for S2
parameter.description: Send secure commands for S2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 - Send non-secure commands to Group 3 (S2 associations)</p&gt <p&gt1 - Send secure commands to Group 3 (S2 associations)</p&gt</p&gt
